title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 12-1.11 - Approved devices or materials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 12-1.11 - Approved devices or materials

State Regulations

Any device or material which the board has approved
pursuant to section
27-a
of the Labor

Law for use in complying with this Part (rule) may be so used as if by this

Part (rule) specifically authorized, any general or special provision of this

Part (rule) notwithstanding. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
12-1.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
